last_episode_to_air.name: Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Shinjiro struggles in his own fight, his friends put everything they can into defeating Zetton. A new chapter begins for the SSSP.

name: Ultraman
overview: Decades ago, a hero from the stars left this world in peace. Now, the son of Ultraman must rise to protect the Earth from a new alien threat.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: With aliens once again threatening Earth, young Shinjiro must now don the metallic Ultraman Suit to become Ultraman -- like his father before him.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Ultraman teams up with Seven, Ace, Zoffy, Jack and Taro, and together, the united Ultraman brotherhood takes on a new alien threat.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As public sentiment turns against Ultraman, Shinjiro learns that his inherited powers may come with a heavy price, in this exciting series conclusion.

episodes.name: A Power That Does Not Belong On Earth
episodes.overview: Decades since he last merged with Ultraman, Shin Hayata learns of a new threat to Earth. His son, Shinjiro, also shows signs of superhuman strength.

episodes.name: An Inevitable Fate
episodes.overview: Wearing a protosuit, Shin is critically injured while saving Shinjiro from Bemular's attack. In desperation, Shinjiro returns to rescue his father.

episodes.name: Being Ultraman Isn't So Bad
episodes.overview: With Bemular paving the way for other alien species to attack Earth, SSSP's Edo asks Shinjiro to take on the mantle of Ultraman.

episodes.name: Release the Limiter!
episodes.overview: Shinjiro is sent on a mission to exterminate a hostile alien, but the target flees into the city, endangering countless civilians.

episodes.name: An Alien Town
episodes.overview: After uncovering evidence of alien involvement in a string of bizarre homicides, SSSP agent Moroboshi contacts an informant inside an alien enclave.

episodes.name: The Curse That Is Ultraman
episodes.overview: Shinjiro’s reluctance to execute homicidal aliens deeply concerns agent Moroboshi. Shin shares with his son what it truly means to be Ultraman.

episodes.name: Hidden Thoughts
episodes.overview: Embattled at first, Shinjiro finds his resolve and activates a latent power during his fight against a hostile alien. Rena prepares for a big concert.

episodes.name: The Dawn of Truth
episodes.overview: At Rena's concert, an alien calling himself Adad demands a confrontation with Ultraman. Things go from bad to worse when Bemular joins the fray.

episodes.name: Nice To Meet You, Big Brother
episodes.overview: Shinijiro fears that his cover may be blown by an underclassman. Later on, he's taken aback when a rogue Ultraman shows up to aid him in battle.

episodes.name: Star Cluster Council
episodes.overview: Seiji dreams of a day when aliens are accepted openly on Earth. Hoping to fight for this cause, he pleads with the SSSP to bring him on board.

episodes.name: Always Stay the Way You Are
episodes.overview: Seiji has a tense confrontation with Shinjiro and Moroboshi over the use of his powers. Rena asks Shinjiro to give Ultraman a message.

episodes.name: Ace Killer
episodes.overview: Moroboshi, Shinjiro and the might of the SSSP sets out to protect Seiji on his quest to punish those responsible for the airline tragedy 12 years ago.

episodes.name: The Real Ultraman
episodes.overview: The Ultraman trio are fighting a losing battle against the mercenaries, but just when things seem hopeless, Shinjiro's dormant power finally awakens.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: With aliens once again threatening Earth, young Shinjiro must now don the metallic Ultraman Suit to become Ultraman -- like his father before him.

episodes.name: The Man from NY
episodes.overview: While meeting with Rena, Shinjiro suddenly gets a call to stop a rampaging alien. Journalist Kotaro Higashi witnesses the whole incident.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Ultraman teams up with Seven, Ace, Zoffy, Jack and Taro, and together, the united Ultraman brotherhood takes on a new alien threat.

episodes.name: The Sign of a New Awakening
episodes.overview: Shinjiro agrees to help test out and develop a new suit better adapted to his changing powers — and he finds himself using it much sooner than planned.

episodes.name: The Curse of Ultraman
episodes.overview: He can't remember what he did, but Shinjiro's forbidden from wearing his suit for a while. His father can't help but feel that there's an Ultraman curse.

episodes.name: The Choice of a Hero
episodes.overview: Determined to do something, Shinjiro heads out to get his revenge. But then once again, he wakes up with no memory of what happened.

episodes.name: No One to Trust
episodes.overview: Public sentiment has turned completely against Ultraman. Then suddenly, Mephisto hijacks the airwaves to deliver a message directly to the people.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Ide sends Taro and Moroboshi out to search for Shinjiro, who remains on the run, confused by everything that's been happening to him.

episodes.name: A Warrior's Return
episodes.overview: Back in his hideout, Daisuke Arashi tells Shinjiro about his father's past, and they try to narrow down who Mephisto's next target might be.

episodes.name: The Fourth Successor
episodes.overview: After getting devastating news, Rena meets with Seiji Hokuto. Shinjiro talks to Daisuke about the strange dreams he's been having about Zetton.

episodes.name: TARO vs ULTRAMAN
episodes.overview: Rena can't understand what just happened to her, so Seiji brings her to meet the alien who raised him. Taro finally finds Shinjiro.

episodes.name: Time of Awakening
episodes.overview: Jack shows up, surprising Taro and Shinjiro. Rena seeks some answers about where her powers come from. The SSSP gets raided by the police.

episodes.name: The Disaster
episodes.overview: The fight against Mephisto only strengthens the anti-Ultraman sentiment. Moroboshi and Shinjiro try to break into the heavily guarded SSSP headquarters.

episodes.name: A Nightmare Come True
episodes.overview: Shinjiro and Rena reveal some secrets to each other. Joined by his friends, Ultraman faces a powerful enemy from the past.

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: As Shinjiro struggles in his own fight, his friends put everything they can into defeating Zetton. A new chapter begins for the SSSP.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As public sentiment turns against Ultraman, Shinjiro learns that his inherited powers may come with a heavy price, in this exciting series conclusion.
